jobFunction: General Business, Consulting, and Human Resources
industry: Insurance Carriers, Insurance Agencies and Brokerages, and Staffing and Recruiting
description:
The ideal candidate will be comfortable meeting new people frequently and have an ability to determine a candidate's potential through clever questions. They should have excellent organizational skills in order to build and maintain a pipeline of prospective candidates.  

(THIS NOT AN HR ROLE, IT IS CANDIDATE RECRUITING FOR AN EXECUTIVE SEARCH FIRM)

Responsibilities

* Maintain and develop pipeline of eligible candidates for future open positions
* Conduct interviews via phone or TEAMS
* Qualify or reject candidates based on interview feedback and resume reviews
* Serve as contact person for questions from candidates
* Meet KPIs TBD 

Qualifications

* Effective communication skills
* Strong organizational and interpersonal skills
* Experience working with Microsoft Office suite
* High-energy and passion
